'''The Official Minecraft Annual 2018''' is a ''Minecraft'' book authored by [[Mojang AB]].

== Synopsis ==
{{quote|
'''Check out the brand new series of official Minecraft Guides. The first four titles in the series, [[Guide to Exploration]], [[Guide to Creative]], [[Guide to Redstone]] and [[Guide to the Nether and the End]], publish <!-- is this a typo or is sic needed?--> in 2017.'''

The official ''Minecraft'' Annual 2018 is a celebration of ''Minecraft''’s Year of Adventure. Inside you’ll find survival strategy for adventurers, features about [[Adventure|Adventure Mode]] and [[Realms]], inspiration for adventure map builds and ideas for real-world adventures.

It also contains your favourite YouTubers' [[Minecraft: Story Mode|Story Mode]] memories, accounts of the Mojang team’s epic adventures and the Mojang team have some challenges for you to try in-game, too.

It’s almost enough adventuring fun to keep you busy for an entire year.
}}{{cn}}
